dict.acceptation: 某处，在某处；在[到]某处；不知道在[到]什么地方；某地；

sent.orig: Country: Somewhere in Asia! Somewhere that is hard to spot on the world map!
sent.trans: 国籍：在亚洲某个地方！在世界地图很难看得见的地方！

sent.orig: After all, that old thing has to go somewhere. And it's probably a landfill somewhere.
sent.trans: 毕竟那些陈旧的东西还是要处理掉，最大的可能就是在某个地方的填埋场。

sent.orig: Yeah, outside, somewhere maybe you hiked in the country or somewhere like that.
sent.trans: 是这样。但必须是在户外，你可以到乡间去郊游，或者去其它诸如此类的什么地方。

sent.orig: It is said he came from a farm house somewhere in rural America.
sent.trans: 据说他出生于美国农村的某个农舍。

sent.orig: Do you remember where his hometown is? I think it's somewhere in Wisconsin.
sent.trans: 你知道他的家乡在哪里吗？我想是在威斯康辛州的什么地方。
